from pyspark.sql import functions as F, types as T
import uuid

cases_map_raw = (
    spark.read.format("csv")
    .option("header", "true")
    .load(cases_map_path)
)

cases_map = (
    cases_map_raw
    .select(
        F.trim(F.col("Case ID").cast("string")).alias("legacyCaseId"),
        F.trim(F.col("GUID").cast("string")).alias("caseId")
    )
    .dropna(subset=["legacyCaseId", "caseId"])
    .dropDuplicates(["legacyCaseId"])
)

print("Cases map rows:", cases_map.count())
display(cases_map.limit(5))

recharge_raw = (
    spark.read.format("csv")
    .option("header", "true")
    .option("multiLine", "true")
    .option("escape", "\"")
    .load(recharge_path)
)

print("Recharge columns:", recharge_raw.columns)
display(recharge_raw.limit(10))

recharge_rows = (
    recharge_raw
    .filter(F.col("ParentKeyID").isNotNull())
    .withColumn("ParentKeyID_str", F.trim(F.col("ParentKeyID").cast("string")))
    .filter(F.col("ParentKeyID_str") != "-1")
    .withColumn("legacyCaseId", F.col("ParentKeyID_str"))
)

mapped = (
    recharge_rows
    .withColumn("rechargedTo", F.col("3").cast("string"))
    .withColumn(
        "rechargeable",
        F.when(F.length(F.trim(F.col("rechargedTo"))) > 0, F.lit(True)).otherwise(F.lit(None).cast("boolean"))
    )
    .withColumn("finalCost", money_to_decimal(F.col("6")))
    .select("legacyCaseId", "rechargeable", "finalCost")
)

print("Recharge mapped rows:", mapped.count())
display(mapped.limit(20))

case_costs_from_recharge = (
    mapped
    .join(cases_map, on="legacyCaseId", how="left")
    .filter(F.col("caseId").isNotNull())
    .withColumn("id", uuid5_from_caseid(F.col("caseId")))
    .select("id", "rechargeable", "finalCost", "caseId")
    .dropDuplicates(["caseId"])
)

print("Recharge->CaseCosts rows with caseId:", case_costs_from_recharge.count())
display(case_costs_from_recharge.limit(50))

(
    case_costs_from_recharge
    .coalesce(1)
    .write.mode("overwrite")
    .option("header", "true")
    .csv(out_path)
)

print("Wrote recharge CaseCosts to:", out_path)
